mapper.insert: insert into yw_app_database_group (id, name, pid, sort, is_deleted, updated_time, created_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update yw_app_database_group set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, is_deleted = #{isDeleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, name, pid, sort, is_deleted, updated_time, created_time from yw_app_database_group
